|right horn...

6.「いよいよ 来たな～。| ドワーフの国の ガタラ原野にある洞くつが| 最後の修行: Finally... It seems that a cave in the Gatara|Fields of Dwarf Country will be the setting|for the final training...

7.「そんじゃ～ はりきって| 修行を 果たしにいくとしようか～。| もちろん オレ: Well then, I'll go and fulfill my training...|Of course I'll go with you...

8.「命をかけろって 言ってるくらいだからな～。| 何が起こるか わからねえぜ？|: I'm talking about risking your life. You|never know what's gonna happen. We have to be|ready...

9.「安心しろって～！！ なんたって| 今回は このオレが ついてるからな～！: Don't worry~! I've got your back this time,|after all!

11.「何が起こるか お楽しみだな。| よし <cs_pchero> 始めるか～？<y: Let's see what happens... Okay, okay.<cs_pchero>Shall we begin?<yesno><close>

12.「おいおい。ビビッたのか？| オレが ついてるって言っただろ。| いいから さっ: Oh... You scared, huh? I told you I was with|you... Just get on with it!<yesno><close>

13.<cs_pchero>は 魔獣の左角と 魔獣の右角を|ふたつとも 床に突きたてた: <cs_pchero>A hexenbiest's left horn and a hexenbiest's|right horn both sticking out of the floor...

15.「出やがった 出やがった～！| コイツを倒せってことのようだぜ。: He's out! He's out! I'm supposed to defeat|this thing...

16.「お～っと。アンタが倒さないと| 修行失敗ってことも ありえるな～。: Oh... If you don't defeat him, he could fail|his training...

17.「お手並み拝見と いかせてもらうぜ。| がんばってくれよ <cs_pchero>: Let me see what I can do. Good luck with|that.<cs_pchero>~!

21.「やるじゃねえか～。ここまでの修行を| こなしてきたチカラは ダテじゃね～な。: You're good... You've been through so much|training, you've got the strength...

22.「これで 超天道士の名は| アンタに継がれた……のか？| 死ぬ心配は なくなった: Now the name of the supernaturalist has been|passed on to you. Is that so? You don't have|to worry about dying, do you?

23.「おいおい <cs_pchero>。| アンタ 手を抜いたんじゃね～だろうな？: Whoa, whoa, whoa<cs_pchero>I'm sorry. You didn't cut corners, did you?

24.「あ～あ。結局 オレが やっちまったか。| <cs_pchero> 平気か～？|: I... After all, I did it.<cs_pchero>Are you okay? You're not going to die, are|you?

27.「コイツは 不死身の魔物なのか！| だとしたら コレは……マジでヤバいか？: Is this thing an immortal demon? If so, then|this is... Is it really that bad?

28.「その魔物は 強烈なショック状態に| おとさないかぎり 倒すことはできないと|: I've heard from a supernaturalist that you|can't defeat a demon unless you put it into a|state of intense shock...

30.「なんとかしないと <cs_pchero>殿は| 本当に 死んでしまうかもしれま: We have to do something<cs_pchero>He might actually die...

31.「ガウラド～。お前 あの技がなきゃ| コイツを倒せないのを 知ってたんだな。|: Gau... You knew you couldn't defeat him|without that move... Is that what grandpa|made you do?

32.「はあ～。あの技は使いたくないのによ……。| なによりも じ～さんの思うツボって: ... I don't want to use that technique... I|don't like the fact that I'm doing what my|father wants me to do, but I can't help it.

33.「それなら 食らえよ！| 超天道士直伝の必殺技！！: Then take it! A special move straight from|the supertendents!

35.<cs_pchero>の 持っている|『超天遊戯－死の書－』が 光り始めた！: <cs_pchero>I'm sure you're not the only one.

36.「……よくぞ 最後の修行を果たした。| ワシが残せるものは これで すべてじゃ。: ... I'm so proud of you for completing your|final training... This is all I have left.

37.「超天道士の名は おぬしが受け継ぐがいい。| その技と心 そして教えと共に。: You will inherit the name of the supernatural|mage. His skills, his mind, and his|teachings...

38.「新たな超天道士の誕生と 新たな伝説の始まりを| ワシは あの世から見守るとしよ:
I will watch the birth of a new|supernaturalist and the beginning of a new|legend from the afterlife. .... You knew you|
|were going to die, didn't you, old man?

40.「これで あなたは| 名実ともに 超天道士の名を| その身に 受け継いだのです！: You have now inherited the name of the|supernaturalist in both name and reality!

41.「お前 もしかして オレをハメたのか？| <cs_pchero>が死ぬって話も|: Did you, by any chance, set me up?<cs_pchero>I hope you weren't lying when you told me|that you were going to die.

42.「人聞きが悪いですよ ヤーン様。| 武闘家たる者 死の危険は| いつ いかなると: I'm sorry to hear that. As a martial artist,|the threat of death is always and always|near...

43.「やっちまったものは しかたないな……。| 超天道士の名。もらうだけ もらっとく: I can't help what I've done... Super|Tendou... I'll just take what I can get...

44.「<cs_pchero>に 超天道士の名を| 継いでもらおうって オレの作戦は失: <cs_pchero>My plan is to have him take over the name of|the supernaturalist. If I return the Book of|the Dead as is...

45.<cs_pchero>は ヤーンに|超天遊戯－死の書－を 返した。: <cs_pchero>I'm going to ask Jahn for the Book of the|Dead.

46.「オレのわがままで アンタを| つきあわせちまって 悪かったな～。: I'm sorry I got you into this mess because I|was selfish...

47.「おわびと言っちゃ～アレだが| さっきの技を アンタにも 教えてやるよ。| 武闘: As an apology, I'd like to share with you a|technique I just learned. The martial|artist's special move. It's called blackmail.

49.「たいしたものじゃないが コレを| アンタに 贈らせてもらおう。: I know it's not much, but if I could give it|to you...

50.「なあ～ 今度 オレと勝負してくれよ。| アンタとだったら きっと| いい闘いが: You know, next time you want to fight me...|I'm sure we'll have a good fight...

51.「オレも 準備に取りかかるからさ～。| 武闘家になって また オレんとこへ来てく: I'll get ready. Become a martial artist and|come back to me. I'll see you later.<cs_pchero>~.

52.「ついに超天道士の復活が なされた！| どれだけ この時を待ったのか……。: At long last, the supernatural beings have|been resurrected! I don't know how long I've|waited for this...
